channel.title: Emergency on Bayme.sh
channel.description: Recent content in Emergency on Bayme.sh

item.title: Emergency/Private Use
item.description: If you are planning on using Meshtastic in the Bay Area and don’t want to participate in the broader network, or what to make sure you’re setup with your friends/family in case of an emergency, that’s cool. We’ve got some suggestions for you: Don’t use Frequency Slot 0 Use “client” mode
